video.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
video.synopsis: Kai, Jay, Cole and Zane must master their elemental powers and Spinjitzu weapons to protect the land of Ninjago, which also has an underworld.

episodes.synopsis: The ninjas are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon's son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off.
episodes.title: Rise of the Snakes

episodes.synopsis: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: Lloyd unlocks a second tribe, the Fangpyres, to help him regain control. The ninja take action when the Fangpyres attack Jay's family's village.
episodes.title: Snakebit

episodes.synopsis: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor -- the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe.
episodes.title: Never Trust a Snake

episodes.synopsis: Lloyd moves in and tries to help out but just gets in the way. Pythor awakens the Vipoids and the Constrictaurs, and an all-out snake war breaks out.
episodes.title: Can of Worms

episodes.synopsis: Pythor declares himself the destined leader who'll reawaken The Great Devourer, an ancient beast that can't be killed and will consume all of Ninjago.
episodes.title: The Snake King

episodes.synopsis: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble upon a hidden workshop where Zane learns the secret about his past.
episodes.title: Tick Tock

episodes.synopsis: Jay and Nya must cut short their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve one of four fang blades.
episodes.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy

episodes.synopsis: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win the Blade Cup, where one of the fang blades is hidden.
episodes.title: The Royal Blacksmiths

episodes.synopsis: The ninjas are suspicious when their archenemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help search for his missing son, but they realize they have to work together.
episodes.title: The Green Ninja

episodes.synopsis: The ninja try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap. When Lloyd's rescue mission fails, only Lord Garmadon can help.
episodes.title: All of Nothing

episodes.synopsis: The ninja hastily journey to the lost city of Ouroboros to try to stop Pythor from awakening The Great Devourer, but it's a race against time.
episodes.title: Rise of the Great Devourer

episodes.synopsis: Disaster threatens as the ninjas must fight to defeat the all-consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.
episodes.title: Day of the Great Devourer

episodes.synopsis: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas realize Lord Garmadon has forged the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a mega-weapon.
episodes.title: Darkness Shall Rise

episodes.synopsis: When Garmadon accidentally brings to life the ruthless Captain Soto and his pirates, it's up to the ninjas to stop them from plundering Ninjago City.
episodes.title: Pirates vs. Ninja

episodes.synopsis: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas.
episodes.title: Double Trouble

episodes.synopsis: When the ninjas learn Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed, they enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win a cash prize that will help save the dojo.
episodes.title: Ninjaball Run

episodes.synopsis: When the ninjas prevent Garmadon from using his mega-weapon to bring to life a fossilized monster, they're turned into kids and need Lloyd's help.
episodes.title: Child's Play

episodes.synopsis: When Garmadon travels back in time to undo the past and rid the future of ninjas, the ninjas follow him and try to stop him using the Golden Weapons.
episodes.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time

episodes.synopsis: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a stone samurai warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life.
episodes.title: The Stone Army

episodes.synopsis: The ninjas try to flee from the Stone Army, which has been brought to life by the Devourer's toxic venom. Garmadon tries to seize control of the army.
episodes.title: The Day Ninjago Stood Still

episodes.synopsis: The ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a Temple of Light that can restore the ninjas' elemental powers.
episodes.title: The Last Voyage

episodes.synopsis: After fighting off the Stone Army, the ninjas arrive at the Temple of Light and harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd.
episodes.title: Island of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: The ninjas try to return Garmadon's Helmet of Darkness to its perch at the Celestial Clock to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father.
episodes.title: The Last Hope

episodes.synopsis: Garmadon uses his new super-weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, unsettling the balance and allowing the spirit of the Overlord to possess his body.
episodes.title: Return of the Overlord

episodes.synopsis: A great darkness has fallen upon Ninjago as Garmadon's super-weapon has turned it evil, but the ninjas discover light is more powerful than dark.
episodes.title: Rise of the Spinjitzu Master
